ROW.MOVIE_DESC: Nelakonda Bhagavanth Kesari is adamant about getting even with a powerful businessman who cost him money. He is prepared to square off against the formidable foe and resolve their issues amicably.
A gang leader makes a promise to a dying friend by taking on other criminal gangs.

A kind of vindication of BTSâ€”of their talent, authenticity, reach, and emotional connection with fans. All of those things had been called into question by critics, or at times by the artists themselves, in 2023.
